Title: Sea Battle
Description:
Simple implementation of Sea Battle game over network.
Created with educational purposes.
UI written in WPF.
HomeWiki:
Simple implementation of Sea Battle game over network.
Created with educational purposes.
UI written in WPF.



Solution consists of two applications: server and client.

Supports local network server discovery, also you can enter server address manually.



Server has lobby with chat, which is isolated from competition-local chats.
